Text: National Socialist black metal (NSBM), sometimes called Aryan black metal or neo-Nazi black metal, is black metal music that promotes Nazism or similar ideologies.

<Text: National Socialist black metal:  It typically melds neo-Nazi ideology with ethnic European paganism and opposition to "foreign" religions such as Christianity, Islam and Judaism.>

Text: National Socialist black metal:  However, some artists are Satanists or occultists, rather than pagans.

<Text: National Socialist black metal:  NSBM is not seen as a distinct genre, but as a neo-völkisch movement within black metal.>
